itemListElement.name: Quinoa Shell Pasta, White Garlic Jalapeno Sauce with Carrots and Red Bell Pepper. Vegan Glutenfree Soyfree Recipe

@graph.name: Quinoa Shell pasta with Garlic Jalapeno sauce.
@graph.description: Quinoa Shell Pasta, White Garlic Jalapeno Sauce with Carrots and Bell peppers. Vegan, gluten-free soy-free recipe.
recipeIngredient: 2 cups cooked Quinoa shells or other pasta of choice (cooked according to instruction)
2 teaspoons extra virgin olive oil or other oil or choice (or vegetable broth to make Oil free)
1  large Carrot peeled and sliced
1/2  a large Red bell pepper sliced
1  medium Tomato chopped small
1/2 teaspoon salt
1 teaspoon dried basil or parsley
2-4 Tablespoons ground raw Cashew (more for thicker sauce)
2 Tablespoons Flour (I used wheat, use any neutral flour or cashew flour)
1/2 cup Coconut milk  (or other non dairy milk of choice)
1/2  Jalapeno (or to taste or Leave out for plain white garlic sauce)
3-4 cloves of garlic (Use roasted garlic for a roasted garlic sauce)
1/2 teaspoon mustard powder
1 Tablespoon nutritional yeast
1/4 teaspoon salt
1 Tablespoon Extra virgin olive oil (Omit for Oil free)
Use roasted Garlic instead of raw garlic.
Add a teaspoon of onion flakes
Use ground white pepper to taste instead of Jalapeno
Add a generous pinch of fresh grated nutmeg.

recipeInstructions.text: Blend all the ingredients of the Jalapeno garlic Sauce until smooth and keep ready.
recipeInstructions.name: Blend all the ingredients of the Jalapeno garlic Sauce until smooth and keep ready.

recipeInstructions.text: In a large pan, saute the veggies for 4-5 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: In a large pan, saute the veggies for 4-5 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: (Saute in vegetable broth to make Oilfree)
recipeInstructions.name: (Saute in vegetable broth to make Oilfree)

recipeInstructions.text: Add the pasta, salt, dried basil, tomatoes and sauce and mix well.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the pasta, salt, dried basil, tomatoes and sauce and mix well.

recipeInstructions.text: Cover and cook for 4-5 minutes on low heat until the sauce begins to boil and thickens.
recipeInstructions.name: Cover and cook for 4-5 minutes on low heat until the sauce begins to boil and thickens.

recipeInstructions.text: Stir and cover for another 2 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Stir and cover for another 2 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Top with non dairy Mozzarella or bread crumbs or white pepper or serve as is.
recipeInstructions.name: Top with non dairy Mozzarella or bread crumbs or white pepper or serve as is.
